| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate`  |                                    | `boolean`           | `undefined` |

| `labelPosition` | `label-position` |                                    | `"left" \| "right"` | `undefined` |
| `theme`         | `theme`          |                                    | `"dark" \| "light"` | `undefined` |
